statements: UPDATE rewards_points SET points = 500 WHERE user_id = 1234 AND card_number = '1234567890123456';
UPDATE rewards_points SET category = 'Groceries', transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 5678 AND points > 1000;
UPDATE rewards_points SET points = points + 50 WHERE user_id = 123 AND card_number = '1234-5678-9012'
UPDATE rewards_points SET category = 'Grocery Shopping', points = 500, transaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE user_id = 456 AND card_number = '9876-5432-1098'
UPDATE rewards_program SET points_earned = 1000 WHERE credit_card_number = '1234567890123456';
UPDATE spending_history SET transaction_amount = 50.99, merchant_name = 'Grocery Store' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE rewards_program SET points_earned = points_earned + 100 WHERE spending_category = 'Groceries';
UPDATE spending_history SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount * 1.05 WHERE merchant_name = 'Amazon';
UPDATE rewards_points SET total_points = 1000 WHERE user_id = 12345
UPDATE user_spending SET amount_spent = 50.75 WHERE user_id = 54321 AND category_id = 1
UPDATE rewards_points SET total_points = total_points + 100 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_spending SET amount_spent = amount_spent * 1.2 WHERE user_id = 456 AND category_id = 789
UPDATE credit_cards_rewards SET rewards_points = 1000 WHERE credit_card_id = 1;
UPDATE credit_card_transactions SET transaction_amount = 50.25, category_id = 2 WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE credit_cards_rewards SET rewards_points = rewards_points + 100 WHERE credit_card_id = 123;
UPDATE credit_card_transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount - 50, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE credit_card_id = 456 AND category_id = 2;
UPDATE rewards_points SET points_accumulated = 500 WHERE user_id = 123 AND card_id = 456 AND spending_category = 'Grocery';
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 789;
UPDATE rewards_points SET points_accumulated = points_accumulated + 50 WHERE user_id = 101 AND card_id = 201 AND spending_category = 'Groceries';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 75, transaction_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE user_id = 102 AND card_id = 202;
